Description: Complete all pre-joining formalities including background verification and document submission.
Welcome video from CEO introducing company culture, mission, and values at Swavik.
HR presentation covering company policies, leave structure, and employee benefits in detail.
Step-by-step guide for laptop setup, email configuration, and software installation instructions.
Interactive module covering company history, organizational structure, and key business units.
Meet your team members through scheduled introduction calls with department colleagues.
Review and acknowledge receipt of employee handbook and key company policies.
You have been assigned a buddy who will guide you through your first month at Swavik.
Department-specific training modules relevant to your role and responsibilities.
Access credentials for various internal systems - ERP, CRM, HR portal, and communication tools.
Mandatory cybersecurity awareness training covering data protection and safe practices.
Enroll in health insurance, 401k/Provident Fund, and other voluntary benefits.
Hands-on session on using company tools - Slack, Jira, Confluence, and internal systems.
30-day check-in with HR to address any questions and ensure smooth onboarding progress.
Detailed documentation of department-specific processes, workflows, and standard operating procedures.
Introduction to current projects, clients, and ongoing work in your team with context.
Mandatory compliance modules including ethics, anti-harassment, and data privacy training.
Session on setting SMART goals for the first 90 days with your manager's guidance.
First formal review discussing progress, challenges, and feedback after first month.
Welcome lunch with team and invitation to company social events and employee resource groups.
